input.name: vigilence
input.desc: Vigilence : allow to trigger learning and reset activities

input.name: learn
input.desc: Learning rate : set to 1 to trigger learning. Learning is apply in one iteration.

input.name: reset
input.desc: Reset output activities : if vigilence is lower than 0.5, start to forget using "dicket" factor, else output activities is set to zero.

input.name: timeout
input.desc: Timeout (in number of iteration) before resetting memory.

input.name: dicket
input.desc: Forgetting factor to decrease output activities
